abstract: Consol Energy will buy the Appalachian natural gas properties of Dominion Resources for $3.48 billion in cash, giving it a leading position in the growing Marcellus Shale field, Reuters reports.
snippet: Consol Energy will buy the Appalachian natural gas properties of Dominion Resources for $3.48 billion in cash, giving it a leading position in the growing Marcellus Shale field, Reuters reports.
lead_paragraph: Consol Energy will buy the Appalachian natural gas properties of Dominion Resources for $3.48 billion in cash, giving it a leading position in the growing Marcellus Shale field, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Consol Energy Buys Gas Assets From Dominion
